Logging

VesselSDK provides a logging capability. It is a wrapper on top of standard android logging functionality. To enable Vessel Logger import following statement.

import com.vessel.Log;

Vessel Log overrides standard android logging api. Learn more.

For example:

Log.i("MyActivity", "MyClass.getView() â€” get item number " + position);

Logging

VesselFramework provides a logging capability. You can use it by calling log method as below.

[VesselCrashReporter log:@"Log message %@", message];
